TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PropertyReleaseMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the release mode for the properties in the new shared property group.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyReleaseMode Process = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The property group is not destroyed until the process in which it was created has terminated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.PropertyReleaseMode Standard = int32(0)

Docs.summary: When all clients have released their references on the property group, the property group is automatically destroyed. This is the default COM mode.
